The decoding from the input encoded text file with non-letters ommitted goes as follow:

010110010101100  11111011011: Not a valid code.  Only 1s or 0s allowed.

101100001016010011011101101100010110010101100010111000110111: Not a valid code.  Only 1s or 0s allowed.

1111111000100011111a1101011111011001111111000100011111000001010000001110/.010111: Not a valid code.  Only 1s or 0s allowed.

1101101000010001111100011111101000000101100: HELLOWORLD
